thread.title: Harcourts Premier in Irvine, CA, Celebrates Grand Opening
thread.title_full: Harcourts Premier in Irvine, CA, Celebrates Grand Opening

author: Erica King, Marketing and Communications Manager
title: Harcourts Premier in Irvine, CA, Celebrates Grand Opening
text:
Harcourts USA, international real estate group, welcomes new owners Landon Miller and Brandon Hobbs to the Harcourts family of franchises with the opening of their office in Irvine, California. Landon Miller and Brandon Hobbs bring a diverse and in-depth perspective to the industry, with over 7 years of experience in the Orange County area, from the Inland Cities to the Coastal Communities.
Harcourts Premier is the first Harcourts office to open in North Orange County, strategically chosen by the two Broker-Owners.
“We love the proximity to all cities in Orange County. It is very easy for our agents and clients to access our centrally located office.”
Harcourts Premier celebrated their Grand Opening on August 13, 2015 with an exceptional turnout. The office wowed local attendees which included fellow Harcourts Sales Consultants, business partners, vendors – even the Mayor of Irvine, Steven Choi. The party was elaborate and well-planned and their office, “a flash, yet pristine representation of the Harcourts brand,” said Harcourts Pacific Regional Director, Rob Forde.
The Harcourts Premier team is a group of young talent; tenacious and savvy, presenting only the latest technology and innovative marketing to match their modern edifice.
Beyond their technical skills and extensive knowledge of residential real estate, the team understands the importance of honesty, responsiveness, and persistence in what they do. Their consistent commitment to developing and maintaining relationships is driven by their passion for meeting great people.
Harcourts’ fundamental values: People First, Doing the Right Thing, Being Courageous, and Fun and Laughter reflect the values they live by. The duo speaks to which Harcourts value resonates most greatly within their team.
“People first. The basis of our business is relationships and we pride ourselves on taking care of our clients.”
This same value is present at Harcourts’ corporate level, in fact the new owners comment that this was ultimately the reason behind their decision to join Harcourts.
“The corporate team, culture, and ultimately people that make up the entire company were driving factors in our decision to open an office with Harcourts.”
Harcourts is excited to have the Southern California natives as a part of the team and considers them to be brilliant assets to the company as it continues to grow further into North Orange County.
About Harcourts USA:
Harcourts has been at the forefront of the real estate industry for over 125 years, and continues continuing to expand worldwide. With over 800 offices in 8 different countries, Harcourts is committed to providing exceptional personal service to their clients, and prides themselves on trust, honesty, and integrity. Company values include: People First, Doing the Right Thing, Being Courageous, and Fun and Laughter. These are the 11 words the Harcourts team lives by; this philosophy is their recipe for achieving personal satisfaction, high morale, and continued success. Harcourts works closely with several affiliate groups including Luxury Property Selection, to offer clients a comprehensive real estate solution. In 2008, Harcourts launched its charitable arm, the Harcourts Foundation to provide support that helps, grows and enriches our communities. In 2013, Harcourts celebrated its 125 year anniversary.
